property.name: description
property.value: Accessor that spontaneously produces outputs at specified times of day. This implementation produces a counting sequence, so each output will have a value one greater than the previous value. The default parameters will produce an output at the zeroth minute of every hour on any day of the month and any day of the week.

property.name: minute (port)
property.value: The minutes past the hour or "*" to output once per minute. This has value 0 to 59 and defaults to 0.

property.name: hour (port)
property.value: The hour (0 to 23) or "*" to output once per hour.

property.name: date (port)
property.value: The day of the month (0 to 31) or "*"" to output on any day of the month.

property.name: month (port)
property.value: The month (0 to 11) or "*" to output on any month.

property.name: day (port)
property.value: The day of the week (0 to 6, where 0 is Sunday) or "*" to output on any day of the week.

property.name: output (port)
property.value: Output for the the counting sequence, of type number.
